titleInfo.title: Louisianans in the Military Oral History Project

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). T. Harry Williams Center for Oral History

mods.abstract: Documenting Louisiana's military tradition, primarily focusing on World War II.
mods.note: This ongoing interview project, part of the T. Harry Williams Center for Oral Historyâ€™s collection, documents Louisiana's military tradition and focuses primarily on the experiences of World War II veterans. Veterans of the Korean, Vietnam, and Gulf Wars are also interviewed.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
